title: What do class and class application stand for? - Quora

response.answer_text: Class and class helps students to find ideal classes for them. Class and class application is available on Google playstore for Android users. As student faces so many problems to visit every class and this requires much time, so class and class solves this problem and helps students get all information through this application about the classes which he may want to join. These details include the following: Distance and direction of the classesContact and emailInsights of the classesTeachers name, experience and qualificationsFee structurePrevious year high resultsTimingsTest scheduleOther informations about the classes are available in the descriptions like goal/ purpose of the class, website, etc.
